import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
source.a59aea57:
def unitEncoding(df,colName,maxUnit):
    
    df[colName].fillna(df[colName].median(), inplace=True)
    
    maxValue = np.max(df[colName])
    
    print('maxValue=',maxValue)
    
    unitCut =  (int)(maxValue/maxUnit)
    print(unitCut)
    bins = []
    labels = []
    
    bins.append(-1)

    for i in np.arange(maxUnit):
        labels.append(i)
        bins.append(unitCut*i)
    
    labels.append(maxUnit)
    bins.append(np.Inf)
    
    print("bins",bins)
    print("labels",labels)
    
    df[colName] = pd.cut(df[colName], bins=bins, labels=labels)
    print(df[colName])
